topics.title: Algebra
topics.description: Learn the basics of algebra, including variables, equations, and systems of equations.

topics.title: Geometry
topics.description: Discover the world of shapes and their properties, including angles, lines, and polygons.

topics.title: Calculus
topics.description: Take your math skills to the next level with calculus, covering limits, derivatives, and integrals.

topics.title: JavaScript
topics.description: Learn the programming language of the web, including data types, functions, and control flow.

topics.title: Python
topics.description: Explore the versatile and easy-to-learn programming language, including data structures, functions, and modules.

topics.title: Java
topics.description: Get a solid foundation in object-oriented programming with Java, including classes, objects, and inheritance.

topics.title: World History
topics.description: Explore the major events and trends in world history, from ancient civilizations to modern times.

topics.title: US History
topics.description: Learn about the history of the United States, from the colonial period to the present day.

topics.title: European History
topics.description: Get an overview of the history of Europe, from the Middle Ages to the present day.

topics.title: General Chemistry
topics.description: Learn the fundamental concepts of chemistry, including atomic structure, bonding, and reactions.

topics.title: Organic Chemistry
topics.description: Study the chemistry of carbon-based compounds, including their structures, properties, and reactions.

topics.title: Biochemistry
topics.description: Explore the chemical processes that occur within living organisms, including metabolism, DNA, and proteins.
